name: Energy Mover
overview: Energy Mover is all about building an energy supply system. The player must find a proper way to change one type of energy to another (for example water energy to electrical energy), using specified number of available machinery and wires/pipes. The task must be done by a certain time limit. Some of the boards, which actually are world continents, contain an obstructions in the the shape of randomly occurring black holes or walls, destroying parts of the installation.
